I played this game long time ago, back when I had another account. It was good and enjoyable experiences for me playing competitive games, old players were playing it daily and very good at it. Nowadays, it is hard to find any community servers with decent amount players, but those skilled players are still there playing. In my opinion, I think migrating to CS:GO has better experience for me, with the options to own pretty skins and share the experience, though I have to get used to some new features and game play overall. Good old classic game.
Yes. l recommend playing this game as it super cool =*

If you think Call of Duty is competitive don't even bother buying this game. This is for the die hard FPS fans. Huge learning curve. It will take a long time to hone your skills. This game is timeless and one of the most intense shooters ever released.
I mean it when I say it, it's better than CS:GO by miles, and also really helps with missing Gmod textures.
